e.t:
I am Haralampi Staykov and I am a technologist.

This website contains thought that are offerings to the one who whats to read them.

I don't claim to know better, nor I want to convince you into anything. The world is as it is and I wander in it the same way you do.

Thoughts can light a path, taking it or choosing another is how we walk our way.

You can contact me on [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/haralampi/) or send emails to [work@haralampi.com](mailto:work@haralampi.com).

#### Contributor to [Sofmon](https://www.sofmon.com)

Sofmon is an attempt to build set of tools that replace unnecessary dependency on obscure services.

Tools to be used by your own judgment and nobody elseâ€™s.
